Docs.param: The value to apply the unit to.
Current display metrics to use in the conversion -- supplies display density and scaling information.
Docs.summary: Converts an unpacked complex data value holding a dimension to its final floating point value.
Docs.returns: The complex floating point value multiplied by the appropriate metrics depending on its unit.

Docs.param: A complex data value holding a unit, magnitude, and mantissa.
Current display metrics to use in the conversion -- supplies display density and scaling information.

MemberSignature.Value: public static float ComplexToFraction (int data, float base, float pbase);
.method public static hidebysig float32 ComplexToFraction(int32 data, float32 base, float32 pbase) cil managed
Public Shared Function ComplexToFraction (data As Integer, base As Single, pbase As Single) As Single
public: static float ComplexToFraction(int data, float base, float pbase);
static member ComplexToFraction : int * single * single -> single

Docs.param: A complex data value holding a unit, magnitude, and mantissa.
The base value of this fraction. In other words, a standard fraction is multiplied by this value.
The parent base value of this fraction. In other words, a parent fraction (nn%p) is multiplied by this value.
Docs.summary: Converts a complex data value holding a fraction to its final floating point value.
Docs.returns: The complex floating point value multiplied by the appropriate base value depending on its unit.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
